trait.name: Nimble Escape
text: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.
